body_html: Won't it be the case that if they want to use PyTorch from C++ they would need all of torch/csrc/ and not only torch/csrc/api/src? Is there any reason why we want to keep includes in a separate directory than source files? That's different than all our conventions so far, and in my experience makes traversing the code much harder, because you have to jump between two deep chains of directories.

body: Won't it be the case that if they want to use PyTorch from C++ they would need all of `torch/csrc/` and not only `torch/csrc/api/src`? Is there any reason why we want to keep includes in a separate directory than source files? That's different than all our conventions so far, and in my experience makes traversing the code much harder, because you have to jump between two deep chains of directories.
